titles.title: Reset Act of 2017
Reset Act of 2017
To provide for a study and reconsideration by Congress of certain major rules, and for other purposes.
Reset Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Government Reform, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law.
